title: Build executor
description: Executor to build Angular applications with Rspack.

main.description: Path to the main.ts entrypoint for the Angular application.

index.description: Path to the index.html template for the Angular application.

tsConfig.description: Path to the tsconfig file to use for TS.

outputPath.description: Path to output the built files.

styles.description: Paths to global stylesheets to be included.

stylePreprocessorOptions.description: Options to pass to style preprocessors.

includePaths.description: Paths to include. Paths will be resolved to workspace root.

scripts.description: Paths to global scripts to be included.

assets.description: Paths to assets to be included as-is.
